about_the_game:
Enter the thrilling world of "Bloody Downsizing," where financial analyst John Varga transforms into a lethal force to be reckoned with. In this heart-pounding rogue-lite arena shooter, John must rely on his wits and newfound combat skills to survive the most brutal downsizing his company has ever seen.



Master the game's slow-motion feature to exploit your enemies' vulnerabilities and make each kill a breathtaking cinematic experience. Make every round unique as you choose your profile, enhance your character, and wield deadly weapons to obliterate waves of relentless foes. Will you rise as the last one standing or become another victim of the savage downsizing?

Features


  • High-octane, rogue-lite arena gameplay that puts you in the shoes of lone John Varga, showcasing visceral, bloody combat and strategic decision-making.
  • An array of unique profiles to choose from, each tailored to a different playstyle that brings its own strengths and weaknesses.
  • A dynamic upgrade system that enables players to enhance their character and obtain mighty weapons, making John Varga an unstoppable force.
  • Persistent blood effects add a layer of gritty realism and immersion, keeping you on the edge of your seat as you navigate the treacherous battleground of corporate downsizing.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains Blood and Gore and Intense Violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3800XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 6800, 16 GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Survive the onslaught in "Bloody Downsizing," a rogue-lite arena shooter set in a cutthroat corporate world. Play as John Varga, a financial analyst, thrust into a chaotic battle for survival. Customize your profile, power up, and harness the epic slow-motion feature to deliver jaw-dropping kills.
